common_0030_mama_02: Oh! Already in your uniform and everything![VAR 0114(002B)]
common_0030_mama_03:
Well, it is your first day at your new school,
after all.[VAR 0114(002B)]
common_0030_mama_05:
Still, you might want to cool your engines before
you go racing out the door.[VAR 0114(002B)]
common_0030_mama_06:
The school contacted me and said that you’re
supposed to wait here a little while longer.\r
Their words, not mine![VAR 0114(002B)]
common_0030_mama_07:
Apparently there’s something [VAR COLOR(0006)]very important[VAR COLOR(0000)] for
your first day that still hasn’t arrived.[VAR 0114(002B)]
common_0030_mama_08:
Maybe that’s the very thing we’re waiting for!
[VAR TRNAME(0000)], get the door, would you?[VAR 0114(002B)]
